_source.text: 2.5% is better tha none... think about Gastly and Kecleon... anyways... most secondary evolution are -19% for recruiting... so if my pokemon is level 50, exactly this number, with friend bow (+10%), and is Platinum rank, does is sound possible to recruit secondary evolutions?
